original: Horse Artillery
translation: 骑炮兵

original: With coordination, crews can quickly unlimber and fire, and limber-up and move away. This creates a fast-moving and fast-firing artillery.
translation: 通过互相配合，队员们可以迅速设置好火炮然后开火，然后重新将火炮装好然后离开。这建立了具有高机动性的火炮部队。

original: The Armed Neutrality Act
translation: 武装中立法案

original: Our merchants have a right to trade without foreign involvement and we will protect that right.
translation: 我们的商人有权进行不受外国干涉的贸易，我们要保护这种权利。

original: Public Road Act
translation: 公共道路法案

original: Let us dedicate our military a full week per year to maintaining our infrastructure.
translation: 让我们的军队每年奉献一整周时间来维护我们的基础设施。

original: The Rapid-Integration Act
translation: 快速整合法案

original: Our excellent administration makes it easy to integrate new provinces into our country.
translation: 我们优秀的行政管理体制，使得我们能更轻松地将新省份整合进我们的国家。

original: Colonial Garrisons
translation: 殖民地驻军

original: By establishing permanent overseas garrisons we can encourage the growth of our colonies.
translation: 通过建立永久性的海外驻军，我们可以鼓励殖民地的发展。

original: The Colonial Settlement Act
translation: 殖民地定居法案

original: Our ready supply of people makes it easy to maintain constant colonial growth.
translation: 充足的人员补给使殖民地的持续发展变得十分容易。

original: Military Prowess
translation: 军事力量

original: Our soldiers are numerous and well trained. The world fears our military might.
translation: 我们拥有大量训练良好的士兵，全世界都在我们的军事力量下颤抖。

original: The Naval School Act
translation: 海军学校法案

original: By establishing naval schools, we will be able to improve the quality of our admirals and sailors alike.
translation: 通过建立海军学校，我们将提高我们的海军将领和水手的素质。

original: Naval Infrastructure
translation: 海军基建

original: We are able to maintain a large naval infrastructure to support more ships.
translation: 我们能够维持大量的海军基建，这样就可以支持更多的海军。

original: The Organized Marines Act
translation: 水兵组织法案

original: Our warships are equipped with capable marines, making them more resilient to enemy boarding action.
translation: 我们的战舰上配备有善战的水兵，使得在面对敌军登舰作战时更具抵抗力。

original: Exploration Charters
translation: 探索许可

original: Expeditions into Terra Incognita are costly and risky. Supporting potential explorers will make their life a lot easier - and results more likely.
translation: 远征队进入未知地区是十分昂贵且危险的行为，给予潜在的探险家们一些援助，会使远征队的旅程更加轻松，也更容易获得成果。

original: Superior Supply Systems
translation: 优良的补给系统

original: Supplying troops in foreign lands is never easy. Thankfully, we have learned a few tricks that make this a lot easier. For more details please see Hearts of Iron III on how to make a flawless logistics simulator.
translation: 向身处外国的的军队提供补给是十分困难的。幸运的是，我们拥有一些小技巧可以使这一过程更加容易。更多内容请关注钢铁雄心3中的“如何打造完美的后勤模拟器”。

original: State Missionary Act
translation: 国家传教法案

original: The Administration of the State is sponsoring the promotion of the one true faith.
translation: 政府正在推行唯一正统信仰的法案。

original: For the Glory of God
translation: 为了主的荣耀

original: Our country is host to many pious men that show true talent in their professions.
translation: 我们的国家正由许多虔诚且十分专业的人来治理。

original: The Espionage Act
translation: 间谍法案

original: By using the newest inventions we can stay ahead of our enemies and make our espionage even more powerful.
translation: 通过使用最新的发明，我们能领先于敌人，并使我们的间谍行动更加容易。

original: The Diplomatic Cooperation
translation: 外交合作

original: By intensifying cooperation with our neighbors we will have an unparallel access to great minds to recruit for our court.
translation: 通过与我们的邻居加深合作，我们将有无可匹敌的优势来将那些优秀的人才招募到我们的宫廷中来。

original: The Banking System
translation: 银行系统

original: Some of our traders have stated that they desire to establish a banking system. If we support them, it will not only benefit them, but also us.
translation: 一些商人希望可以建立一个银行系统，我们若是支持他们，这将是一场双赢的交易。

original: New Naval Tactics
translation: 新式海军战术

original: Our admirals may be a bit unorthodox with their tactics from time to time, but success proves them right.
translation: 我们的海军将领们时不时会对海军现有的战术有所叛离经道，但之后的成功往往证明了他们的正确性。

original: Scientific Expeditions
translation: 科学考察

original: By making sure that at least one scholarly person is part of our expeditions, we will be able to learn and find many new things that might be beneficial for our economy.
translation: 通过确保远征队中拥有至少一位学者，我们将会学习和发现一些可能有益于经济的新事物。

original: Hired Adventurers
translation: 雇佣探险家

original: The prospect of wealth and prosperity has drawn a lot of adventurers to the newly discovered lands. By hiring the most capable ones we will make sure that their services are always at our disposal.
translation: 出于对金钱和地位的渴望，许多探险家们来到了才被发现的土地。通过雇用一些有能力的探险家，就可以保证他们听从我们的指挥。

original: Edict of Tolerance
translation: 宽容敕令

original: Our diligent administration shall protect the rights given to religious minorities in our realm.
translation: 明智的政府应该保护国内宗教少数派的合法权益。

original: Modern Siege Weapons
translation: 新式围城武器

original: Thanks to our diligent engineers, we can field ever more powerful siege weapons.
translation: 多亏了我们勤奋的工程师们，我们可以装备上更强的攻城武器。

original: Superior Fortifications
translation: 优良的防御工事

original: We shall make sure that our fortresses are always built and equipped with state-of-the-art technologies.
translation: 我们应该确保使用了最先进的技术建造和武装堡垒。

original: Modern Firearm Techniques
translation: 新式火器技术

original: Firearms have become a vital asset to our armies. Our leaders know how to use them to our advantage.
translation: 火器已经成为我们军队中至关重要的资源，我们的将领们知道如何将其转化为我们的优势。

original: The Garrison System
translation: 卫戍系统

original: Thanks to a garrison system we can make sure that recruits are assigned where we need them the most.
translation: 通过卫戍系统，我们可以确保新兵们可以出现在最需要他们的地方。

original: Noble Loyalty Act
translation: 贵族忠诚法案

original: Our spies shall make sure that our nobles stay loyal to the crown, even in times of trouble.
translation: 我们的间谍应当确保国内的贵族们保持对于君主的忠诚，即使是在危难时刻。

original: Manueline Architecture
translation: 曼努埃尔式建筑

original: This innovative style synthesizes aspects of Late Gothic architecture with influences of the Spanish, Italian and Flemish elements. The constructions in Manueline were largely financed by proceeds of the lucrative spice trade with Africa and India.
translation: 这种创新的建筑风格将晚期哥特式建筑的各方面与西班牙，意大利和佛兰德的元素综合起来。曼努埃尔式的建筑很大程度上受到了非洲、印度香料交易的资助。

original: Trade Connections Policy
translation: 贸易关系政策

original: By using the connections of our old noble families, we can make life much easier for our merchants.
translation: 通过利用古老的贵族家族的人脉，我们可以使商人的工作更加轻松。

original: The Colonial Nobility Act
translation: 殖民贵族法案

original: By creating a nobility in the colonies and providing the power to hold the locals with an ironfist we'll establish a great base for manpower for our national army.
translation: 通过在殖民地册封贵族以及给予其用铁拳控制当地人的权力，我们的国家军队将会获得更多的人力。

original: Noble Naval Traditions
translation: 贵族海军传统

original: Our nobles have been a vital part of our navy for quite some time now. Their old traditions and skills shall be quite valuable in the future.
translation: 一直以来，贵族们都是海军的不可或缺的一部分，他们的传统以及技能将在未来发挥极大的作用。

original: Chivalry Heritage
translation: 骑士精神的遗产

original: The time of chivalry may be over, but cavalry remains a powerful weapon on the battlefield. Our nobles will just have to adapt a bit.
translation: 骑士精神的时代或许已经结束了，但骑兵依旧是战场上强有力的武器。我们的贵族们也需要适应一些。

original: The Local Reserves Act
translation: 地方预备役法案

original: Our nobles shall make sure that they always have a local reserve of soldiers at their disposal.
translation: 贵族们应该确保他们在当地拥有一支听从指挥的预备役军队。

original: Nobility from Battlefield Act
translation: 军功爵禄法案

original: There are always nobles that distinguish themselves on the battlefield. By making sure that these fine men receive a place in our armies, we will improve the quality of our troops as a whole.
translation: 总是会有一些贵族在战场上脱颖而出，通过确保这些人在军中获得合适职位，我们将从整体上提升军队的素质。

original: The Compulsory Levy Act
translation: 义务征兵法案

original: By increasing the number of soldiers that the nobles have to provide, we can field even larger armies.
translation: 通过增加贵族必须提供的兵员数量，我们可以组成更大规模的部队。

original: Shady Embassies
translation: 可疑的大使

original: Combining the trickiness of our spies with the elegance of our ambassadors will result in much faster creation of our claims.
translation: 通过间谍以及大使的合作，我们将可以更快速地制造宣称

original: Merchant Embargo Act
translation: 商业禁运法案

original: By backing up our own traders with seasoned agents we can make sure that enemy merchants will be discredited for good.
translation: 通过经验丰富的间谍来支持我们自己的商人，我们就可以确保敌人的商人们名誉扫地。

original: The Diplomatic Defense Act
translation: 外交抵抗法案

original: To defend our home we need to be prepared to maintain a large cabinet capable of managing a large complex network of relations to ensure an international balance of power.
translation: 为了保卫祖国，我们需要维持一个足以处理复杂关系网的庞大内阁，以便确保各国均势。

original: The Loyalty Act
translation: 忠诚法案

original: Loyal citizens who reveal dangerous elements in our territories will be greatly rewarded by the state.
translation: 那些指出我们国土上危险因素的公民将会受到国家的重赏。

original: The Privy Council Establishment Act
translation: 枢密院成立法案

original: Being informed about the events within the state is vital for any ruler. By establishing a privy council we will be able to keep an eye on our people.
translation: 对于统治者来说，知晓领地内的事务是十分重要的，通过建立枢密院，我们就可以对我们人民的一举一动了如指掌了。

original: The Foreign Support Act
translation: 国外援助法案

original: Sometimes the best way to defeat our enemies is turning their own people against them. Costly, but safe.
translation: 有时，打败敌人的最好方法是让发动敌人的人民反抗他们的政府。这种方法十分昂贵，但更加保险。

original: The Colonial Supervision Act
translation: 殖民地监督法案

original: Our viceroys have been notoriously corrupt in the past. We will tolerate this no longer.
translation: 过去，我们的总督因为贪污成性而声名狼藉。现在，我们将对这类事件零容忍。

original: The Naval Civilian Neutrality Act
translation: 海军民事中立法案

original: Our spies can provide vital information to deal with smugglers and blockade breakers.
translation: 我们的间谍可以提供针对走私者和突破封港者的重要信息。.

original: The Deserter Act
translation: 逃兵法案

original: We have been way too lenient on deserters in the past. Now our agents will make sure that cowards suffer their deserved fate.
translation: 过去，我们对于逃兵过于宽容，从今往后，我们的特工将确保这些懦夫获得他们应得的惩罚。

original: The Mercenary Registration Act
translation: 雇佣兵登记法案

original: By keeping tabs on the mercenaries within our country we can make sure that we will benefit from their services when we need them the most.
translation: 过去，我们对于逃兵过于宽容，从今往后，我们的特工将确保这些懦夫获得他们应得的惩罚。

original: The Royal Commission Act
translation: 皇家委员会法案

original: Checking on suspicious behavior within the administration might be a good idea from time to time. The creation of royal commissions will certainly help to reduce corruption.
translation: 对于政府内的可疑行为进行调查是十分有必要的，皇家委员会的建立毫无疑问会减少腐败行为。

original: The Anti-Heresy Act
translation: 反异端法案

original: Everyone must always work against heresies. Heresies are punishable by death!
translation: 每个人都必须旗帜鲜明的对抗异端，异端分子应被判处死刑！

original: The Naval Secrecy Act
translation: 海军保密法案

original: We have seen much of this strange New World. Things that our enemies certainly would like to know. Henceforth, all naval matters shall be regarded secret information.
translation: 我们对这个奇特的新大陆已经有了一定的认识，毫无疑问我们的敌人也很想获得这些情报。从今以后，一切海军事务都将被视为机密信息。

original: Local Army Organization
translation: 地方军队组织

original: We shall reorganize our army to make sure that our forces can fight efficiently whenever needed and wherever they are needed.
translation: 我们应该重组军队，以此确保无论何时何地，当我们有需要的时候，我军都可以高效作战。

original: Streamlined Galley Production
translation: 流水化桨帆战舰生产

original: Our shipwrights tell us that much could be accomplished in terms of efficiency when it comes to the production of galleys for our navy. By streamlining and standardizing production processes and ensuring that the shipyards are never unsupplied we will lay a solid foundation for our country as a great naval power.
translation: 造船厂告诉我们他们能够大幅提高桨帆战舰生产效率，通过流水化生产和标准化生产工序，同时保证物料供给，我们将可以为我国的海上霸权打下坚实的基础。

original: Edict of Resistance
translation: 抵抗法令

original: Through our clergy we promote the idea of our nation as the one favored in war and that we should never lose faith in our right in this earth. To fight to the very last breath is the very spirit of our people.
translation: 通过我们的教士，我们宣扬了本国在战争中占有优势并且我们永远不应该对我们在这个地球上拥有的权利失去信心。战斗到最后一口气是我们人民的精神。

original: The Public Welfare Act
translation: 公共福利法案

original: The poor have to suffer most in times of trouble. Some small donations shall help to ease their misery - and make sure that the mob won't pick up the torches and pitchforks.
translation: 在困难时期苦难最深重的永远是穷人，而只要一点小小的捐助就能让他们好过一些，使群众们不会愤怒地举起火把和干草叉。

original: The Spy Discovery Act
translation: 间谍揭发法案

original: Our administration will always be a prime target for enemy spies. But there are a few things we can do to make life much harder for them.
translation: 我们的行政机构一直是敌方间谍的首要目标，但我们可以采取一些措施加以防范。

original: Les Invalides Act
translation: 荣军院法案

original: Our aged soldiers have served us well. Now it is our duty to make sure that they can live a worthy life at the end of their military career.
translation: 老兵们已经为国家付出了太多，而现在是国家回报他们的时候了，让老兵们在离开军营后过上有价值的生活是我们义不容辞的责任。

original: Enforce Religious Law
translation: 强制信仰法案

original: Let us look much more closely to our holy scriptures to distinguish crimes and penalties for our society. When a society is ruled in a truly pious way it will make it easier for the devout to spot traitors and deviants.
translation: 让我们更仔细地体会圣经，以此区分和惩罚社会中的罪犯。只有当一个社会以真正虔诚的方式统治的时候，才能让叛徒和异端无所遁形。

original: Cloth Quality Edict
translation: 布匹质量法令

original: To ensure better quality of the cloth offered in the market we declare that if the cloth offered by a merchant is not found to be of satisfactory quality on three separate occasions, such merchant shall be tied to a post with said cloth attached to him as punishment.
translation: 为了保证市场中布匹的质量，我们声明，若是一个商人出售的布匹三次被发现质量不合格，该商人将会和他所卖的布匹一起被绑在杆子上以示惩罚。

original: Policy of Calculated Delay
translation: 有限推延政策

original: With promises and assurances of safety and toleration, we can convince the unbelievers within our realm to remain peaceful and disarmed. This should at least temporarily delay the threat of a religious civil war until we're better equipped to deal with their wickedness and return them to the true faith.
translation: 通过向国内的异教徒承诺人身安全和信仰包容，我们可以说服他们保持温和而不拿起武器。这至少可以暂时推迟宗教战争的威胁，直到我们做好充足的准备，能够将他们引向正信的时候。

original: The Production Quota Act
translation: 生产配额法案

original: Setting and enforcing higher production quota will allow us to simply gain more income by producing more goods.
translation: 设置并强制执行更高的生产配额，可以使我们简单地从更多的产量中获取更多利润。

original: Encouragement of Merchant Navy
translation: 鼓励商业船队

original: Encouragement of the expansion of the private merchant navy will allow us to increase our trade influence across the world.
translation: 鼓励私人商业船队的扩张，可以提高我们的全球贸易影响。

original: The Black Chamber Act
translation: 黑箱法案

original: We should create a dedicated government agency in charge of all things related to espionage, crypto-analytics and covert operations.
translation: 我们应该建立一个负责一切有关间谍活动、密码分析以及秘密行动的政府机构。

original: Revenue Farming
translation: 农业税

original: Tax or Revenue Farming is one of the oldest practices there is to achieve a safe and steady income to the state or to ensure investment even where they would require more capital than the state might be willing to spend at a particular time. Revenue farming would certainly also stimulate the growth of our financial sector.
translation: 农业税是最古老的政策之一，它保证了国家拥有安全稳定的收入，或者确保国家在某一段特定时间内也可以进行超出预算的投资。农业税将一定会刺激我国的经济增长。

original: The Tolerance Act
translation: 宽容法案

original: It is important that we support the various religious groups in our society and not try to force a single religion on our citizens.
translation: 在我们的社会中，支持不同的信仰是十分重要的，不要试图将一种宗教强加到所有人身上。

original: Commercial Embassies
translation: 商业大使

original: Our ambassadors abroad should not only act as envoys, they should also be tasked with protecting and promoting our trade. They should look that all past agreements keep being extended and honored in foreign courts and shouldn't shy from spying on our competitors in order to sabotage their efforts.
translation: 我们的驻外大使不应该只作为使节存在，他们应该同时保护并提升我们的贸易力量，他们应该将过去的协议延伸使用到外国，并不会羞于刺探竞争者的信息，同时妨害他们的努力。

original: The Naval Exploration Act
translation: 海军探索法案

original: Refitting our ships for exploration of the unknown seas will enable them to venture farther from our shores.
translation: 对我们的船只进行适于远海探索的改造，他们将能够驶向更远的目标。

original: The Active Foreign Recruitment Act
translation: 积极招募外国人员法案

original: Our nation should be known to pay mercenaries fighting for our cause well thereby attracting more able men.
translation: 我们的国家应以优待为我们而战的雇佣兵而闻名，这将更容易吸引一些有能力的人。

original: The Sappers Act
translation: 工兵法案

original: A military rule that insists that every regiment of Infantry keeps a squad of sappers for when fortifications need to be taken.
translation: 这是一条军事规定，它要求每个步兵团都需要配备一只工兵部队，以防需要构筑工事。

original: Vassal Taxation Policy
translation: 附庸税收法案

original: Ensuring a more aggressive stance in taxation of subject nations will provide better flow of gold to our coffers.
translation: 更加激进的附属国税法，将使我们的金库更加充实。

original: The Stamp Act
translation: 印花税法案

original: We should actively impose additional taxes on our colonial settlements.
translation: 我们应该积极在殖民地征收额外的税。

original: Weapon Quality Standards
translation: 武器质量标准

original: We should actively supervise the production of arms to make sure they meet our high standards.
translation: 我们应该积极监控武器的生产，使它们符合我们的高标准。

original: The Colonial Administration Act
translation: 殖民地管理法案

original: By providing a better control and administration of our colonial effort we can ensure a better focus of our settlers for the good of the nation.
translation: 通过更好的控制和管理我们的殖民地，我们可以确保殖民者们更好地为祖国服务。

original: Trade Kontor Network
translation: 商栈网络

original: By maintaining trade outposts in foreign countries we will have the opportunity to control their commerce without having to fight for the land.
translation: 通过控制外国的贸易节点，我们即使不为土地开战，也有机会控制他们的经济。

original: The Underhanded Diplomacy Act
translation: 秘密外交法案

original: Sometimes people need a 'gift' when you try to persuade them. By funneling more of our resources unto our diplomats we can more easily make people see things our way.
translation: 有时人们需要一些“礼物”才能被说服。通过将更多资源倾斜于我们的外交官，我们可以更容易地让别人站在我们这边。

original: Mandatory Service
translation: 强制性服役

original: To defend the egalitarian ideals of our nation, the entire population has a mandatory obligation to serve in any capacity of military or civil service once in their life. Regardless of stature or gender, we thrive together, we die together.
translation: 为了保卫我们自由民主的国家，全体国民都必须服强制兵役，不管是加入军队还是民兵。无论男女老少，让我们同生共死。

original: The Native Translators Act
translation: 原住民翻译法案

original: The people who have survived in these alien lands for generations might prove beneficial to our colonists if approached the right way.
translation: 通过合适的接触手段，这些在异国他乡生活数代的人将对我们的殖民起到很大作用。

original: The Military Zeal Act
translation: 军事狂热法案

original: Increasing the number of priests within the ranks of our military will help convince our soldiers that God is on our side in war and that they are doing God's work.
translation: 增加军队中的传教士数量，将会让我们的士兵认为神是站在我们这边的，我们是在完成神的任务。

original: The New Model Army Act
translation: 新模范军队法案

original: To defend the republic we must maintain a well-drilled professional army with fully professional officer corps commanding it.
translation: 为了保卫共和国，我们必须维持一支训练良好的军队，并且由一只非常专业的军官队伍来指挥他们。

original: Levée en masse
translation: 全民动员

original: When the republic is in danger all able-bodied males are obliged to rush into military service in order to defend it.
translation: 当共和国危难之时，所有身体健全的男子都有义务参军保卫祖国。

original: Professional Diplomatic Corps
translation: 专业外交官团队

original: By employing professional diplomats, and not just people given the rank of ambassador due to their blood, we gain efficiency.
translation: 通过雇佣职业外交官，而不是通过血脉方式继承外交官职位，我们能获得更高的效率。

original: Letters of Marque
translation: 私掠许可

original: By writing Letters of Marque to enterprising private captains, they will bolster the amount of privateering we can do.
translation: 发放私掠许可给大胆的私人船长，将会大幅提升私掠的收获。

original: The Citizen Service Act
translation: 公民义务法案

original: If citizens have benefits, they also have duties to the state. Service guarantees citizenship!
translation: 如果公民享受了福利，他们也就同时拥有了义务和责任。义务决定了公民权！

original: The Colonial Companies Act
translation: 殖民地公司法案

original: Exploration has become profitable and our merchants want to reach farther than their individual wealth allows. By establishing colonial companies, we can harness their capital to explore, expand and exploit.
translation: 探索已经是有利可图了，我们的商人想要到达仅靠个人财力无法到达的地方进一步寻觅财富。通过建立殖民地公司，我们可以利用他们的资本去探索，扩张和掠夺。

original: The Protected Shipping Lanes Act
translation: 航道保护法案

original: Our ships carrying trade goods throughout the world benefit from taking routes established by the nature of winds and oceans. By securing these lanes, we can ensure that our trade is carried both safely and efficiently.
translation: 我们在全世界运输商品的船只都得益于洋流和季风所形成的航道。通过保护这些航道，我们就可以保证商品运输的安全和效率。

original: Religiously Sponsored Guilds
translation: 宗教资助工会

original: Craftsmanship gives many opportunities to celebrate the spiritual, giving our religious leaders reason to support such work. We aid the manifestation of the divine in the creation of the mundane.
translation: 工艺品为我们提供了许多庆祝宗教节日的机会，这也给我们的宗教领袖提供了支持这类工作的理由。我们帮助神在世俗的创造中显化。

original: The Recordkeeping Act
translation: 存档法案

original: With a law requiring our diplomats to keep every single contract recorded for officials of the state to read, we can be more efficient in our endeavors.
translation: 该法案要求我们的外交官将每份档案都存档整理，供全国的官员阅读，我们就能更有效率地完成工作。

original: The Military Allotment Act
translation: 军事分配法案

original: By allotting resources to our army locally, we can maintain enough manpower to remain prepared for war without increased reliance on mercenaries.
translation: 通过向当地的军队分配资源，我们可以保证足够的人力来准备战争，而不会提升我们对于雇佣兵的需求

original: The Pioneer Policy
translation: 拓荒者政策

original: The state will fund ventures of our citizens to go boldly where none of us have gone before.
translation: 国家将为公民提供探险基金，以使他们大胆地前往没有去过的地方。

original: The Land Inheritance Act
translation: 土地继承法案

original: By allowing the lowliest peasant inheriting the right to continue using the land his forefathers used, we gain productivity as a state.
translation: 通过允许最底层的佃农继承其祖先对土地的使用权，我们的生产力可以大幅提高。

original: Chaplains of the Fleet
translation: 舰队牧师

original: Raging storms on the open seas can test the faith of any sailor, especially one traveling in a war-torn vessel. Military Chaplains of the Fleet aid our recruits in maintaining hope through times of adversity.
translation: 海上的风暴可以挑战任何一个水手的信心，特别是在一艘饱受战争摧残的船上，舰队中的军队牧师可以使我们的士兵在逆境中仍心存希望。

original: The Moral Economy Act
translation: 道德经济法案

original: Many states seem to do all they can to encourage financial and commercial development. This is greatly upsetting to many subjects as it's disruptive to the intended nature of things. By focusing our state's economic policy on maintaining a proper moral economy, where just prices and traditional rights are respected and protected, we would set an example for all others to follow.
translation: 许多国家似乎在尽一切办法鼓励经济与贸易发展。这令很多群体感到极度失望，他们认为此举是对万物天性的破环。如果我们在制定经济政策时，能够着眼于在经济活动中保留一定的道德底线，即对公正价格和传统权利进行尊重和保护，我们就能为所有其他国家树立一个榜样。

original: Field Priests and Soldier's Prayer Books
translation: 神职人员和士兵的宗教祈祷书

original: We must strive to instill zeal in our soldiers and make them willing to sacrifice themselves for our holy cause. At any time we must ensure that there is a great number of priests to care for the spiritual health of our men in the field, to lead them in worship and to take care of them when their lives end. We must also ensure that they are never without prayer books or any other religious material they might desire during our campaigns.
translation: 我们必须努力的让我们的战士们保持热情，使得他们愿意为我们神圣的事业战斗到最后一刻。在任何时候，我们必须有足够的神职人员，确保士兵们的精神健康，引导他们对我们的神进行崇拜并且神职人员们将在他们濒死的时候对他们进行照顾。我们必须确保战士们在战役期间拥有我们的宗教祈祷书或者他们渴望的其他的宗教物品。

original: Currency Council
translation: 货币委员会

original: By establishing a currency council to oversee our minting, we can prevent the unnecessary debasement of our currency.
translation: 通过设立一个货币委员会监督我们的铸币工作，我们可以有效的防止货币贬值。

original: Religious Freedom Act
translation: 宗教自由法案

original: Grant all subjects the freedom of conscience in worshiping whatever deities they see fit.
translation: 赋予所有臣民自由去崇拜他们认为合适的神灵的权力。

original: The Redemption Act
translation: 救赎法案

original: Encourage our misguided subjects to save their souls by granting amnesty for heretical offenses in exchange for returning to the fold.
translation: 通过赦免他们的异端罪行,鼓励我们误入歧途的臣民以回归正信,以此来拯救他们的灵魂。

original: Provincial Autonomy
translation: 省级自治

original: By granting our provinces some autonomy in matters of defense, we will make it harder for enemies both within and without to take them from us.
translation: 通过给予我们的省份部分防卫自主权，我们将使得无论来自内部还是外部的敌人都更难以击破我们

original: Mission to Civilize
translation: 开化的使命

original: It is our holy mission to carry the torch of civilization to the dark corners of the world and save the misguided souls that dwell there.
translation: 把文明的火炬带到世界的黑暗角落，拯救住在那里的误入歧途的灵魂，是我们神圣的使命。

original: Exchange of Ideas
translation: 理念交流

original: By actively encouraging the incorporation of foreign ideas and practices into our culture we can make it easier to implement new ideas in the future.
translation: 通过积极鼓励将外国理念纳入我们的文化，将来我们可以让新的想法更容易实现。

original: Vassal Obligations Act
translation: 附庸义务法案

original: Fix in law the precise military and economic obligations that our client states have towards us.
translation: 在法律上明确我们的附庸对我们的军事和经济义务。

original: Foreign Advisors
translation: 外国顾问

original: By opening our court to persons of all nationalities we can ensure that we get the best advice for the least cost to ourselves, as well as creating valuable diplomatic links abroad.
translation: 通过向各国人士开放我们的宫廷，我们能够以最小的代价获得最好的建议，并在海外创造宝贵的外交纽带。

original: Vassal Integration Act
translation: 附庸兼并法案

original: By harmonizing the command structure of our subjects with our own we will be able to fight better together.
translation: 通过建立与我们属国之间更好的联合指挥体系，我们将发挥出更强的战斗力。

original: Overseas Dominions
translation: 海外领土

original: Ruling distant lands is difficult, particularly when those lands are an ocean away. By establishing dominions ruled by local viceroys loyal to the crown we can get the most out of those lands.
translation: 统治遥远的土地是困难的，尤其是当那些土地远隔重洋的时候。通过建立立由忠于皇室的地方总督负责的自治领，我们可以有效统治那些领土。

original: Enlightened Aristocracy
translation: 开明的贵族

original: Encourage education and high literary standards among the aristocracy in order to ensure that the men leading our nation are the closest followers of our Humanist ideals.
translation: 在贵族中鼓励教育和提高文学水平，以确保领导我们国家的人是我们人文主义理想的最忠实的追随者。

original: The Liberation Act
translation: 解放法案

original: Announce our intention to liberate the downtrodden subjects of foreign tyrants so that they may enjoy the privilege of our own enlightened rule.
translation: 对外宣布我们将要解放受到外国暴君压迫的人民，这将使他们可能会乐于接受我们的开明的统治。

original: Visionary Thinkers
translation: 有远见的思想家

original: Our country is a bastion of intellectual thought and our universities produce some of the brightest and most visionary thinkers in the world.
translation: 我们的国家是知识分子思想的堡垒，我们的大学培养出世界上最睿智、最有远见的思想家。

original: The Transportation Act
translation: 运输法案

original: Establish a fixed system of transportation fees for goods to encourage the exportation of valuable goods.
translation: 建立固定的货物运输费制度以鼓励有价值货物的出口。

original: Harbor Administration
translation: 港口管理局

original: Establish a national office for the administration and maintenance of our harbors.
translation: 建立一个负责港口管理和维护的国家机关。

original: Supply Convoys
translation: 供应车队

original: Ensure that our overseas holdings have regular access to supplies from the homeland.
translation: 确保我们的海外部队能够定期从国内获得补给。

original: Cultural Recognition Act
translation: 文化认同法案

original: By recognizing the distinctiveness and valuable contributions of our minority cultures we can make them feel more included in the state.
translation: 通过认识到我们少数民族文化的独特性和宝贵贡献，我们可以赋予他们更强的国家融入感。

original: Multilingual Diplomats
translation: 多元外交

original: Ensure that our diplomats are educated in the tongues of foreign courts in order to facilitate understanding between us and other cultures.
translation: 确保我们的外交官受过外国宫廷语言的教育，以促进我们和其他文化之间的理解。

original: Native Assimilation Act
translation: 原住民同化法案

original: Actively encourage assimilation of native tribes into our colonies.
translation: 积极鼓励同化原住民部落进入我们的殖民地。

original: Cultural Understanding
translation: 文化理解

original: Our nation has a considerable understanding of the customs and traditions of foreign cultures, allowing us to seamlessly blend into their society when necessary.
translation: 我们国家对外国文化的习俗和传统已有相当的了解，这使我们能够在必要时无缝地融入他们的社会。

original: The Foreign Aid Act
translation: 对外援助法案

original: Foreign Aid, while certainly good for our reputation, can also be a useful tool for pushing our diplomatic agendas abroad.
translation: 对外援助不仅有利于我们的声誉，更是对我们在国外的外交行动的一大助力。

original: Cultural Unity
translation: 文化统一

original: By focusing on unity through faith and customs we can make it easier to assimilate foreigners into our culture.
translation: 通过致力于统一信仰和习俗，我们可以使外国人更容易融入我们的文化。

original: Foreign Political Allies
translation: 海外政治盟友

original: Allies are good to have, and by making those allies push our own interests we can increase our diplomatic influence over other states.
translation: 拥有盟友好处多多，通过让这些盟友为我们自己的利益服务，我们可以增加我们对其他国家的外交影响力。

original: Loyal Governors
translation: 忠诚的管理者

original: Loyalty is the most important virtue, and by ensuring that the Governors of distant provinces are loyal to the crown first and foremost we can increase the utility of those lands.
translation: 忠诚是最重要的美德。通过确保遥远省份的管理者首当其冲地忠于中央政府，我们可以更好地利用这些土地。

original: A Rating System
translation: 评级体系

original: A formal system for rating the class of our ships according to their number of cannon.
translation: 一种根据火炮数量来对舰船进行评级的正规体系。

original: Merchant Protection Act
translation: 商人保护法案

original: Trade is the lifeblood of the world. By granting privileges and protection to our merchants we can ensure that they keep it flowing our way.
translation: 贸易是世界的命脉。通过给予我们的商人特权和保护，我们可以确保商品的流动如我们所愿。

original: The Foreign Relations Act
translation: 外交关系法案

original: Diplomats are of course useful for diplomacy, but they also have a secondary purpose of spying on other states. By ensuring that our diplomats are well schooled in spying under the guise of 'establishing foreign relations' we can get a leg up on our enemies.
translation: 外交官当然在外交活动中有重要作用，但他们还有另一个目的即刺探其他国家的情报。通过确保我们的外交官接受在“建立外交关系”的掩盖下进行间谍活动的训练，我们可以更好的打击我们的敌人。

original: The Citrus Statute
translation: 柑橘法令

original: By requiring that every ship store fresh fruits during its travel our seamen will remain strong and healthy.
translation: 通过要求每艘舰船在远航期间储存足够的新鲜水果，我们的水手将长期保持强健。

original: Terms of Surrender Statute
translation: 投降条款

original: Our ship officers employ unorthodox tactics forcing the enemy to surrender their ships to our navy.
translation: 我们的船员使用非正统的战术迫使敌人将他们的船交给我们的海军。

original: Skilled Cartographers
translation: 训练有素的制图师

original: By recruiting only the best cartographers to make our maps and sea charts we can increase the operating range of our captains.
translation: 通过招收最好的制图师来制作我们的地图和海图，我们能够增加贸易范围和殖民距离。

original: Fortified Trading Posts
translation: 堡垒化贸易站

original: Establishing trading posts in foreign lands is vital to our economic interests, but they tend to be at risk to attack from foreign powers and hostile locals. By providing each with a small garrison we can reduce this risk.
translation: 在外国设立贸易站对我们的经济利益至关重要，但它们往往面临受到外国势力和有敌意的土著攻击的风险。通过给每个贸易站提供一支小型卫戍部队，我们可以减少这种风险。

original: The Integrated Administration Act
translation: 行政一体化法案

original: Integrate our client states into the state administration to improve revenue and simplify governance.
translation: 将我们的附庸纳入国家行政管理体系中，以简政降费。

original: The Cooperation Act
translation: 合作法案

original: Encourage cooperation among our traders so that they work together to take control of lucrative trade routes.
translation: 鼓励我们的贸易商之间的合作，以便同他们共同努力控制利润丰厚的贸易路线。

original: Noble Captains
translation: 贵族船长

original: Encourage the nobility to view the navy as a lucrative career path in order to improve the leadership of our navies.
translation: 鼓励贵族将海军视为有利可图的职业生涯，以改善海军的将领阶层。

original: The Superior Armament Act
translation: 优良军备法

original: Create strict requirements for the quality and size of cannon that are mounted on our ships.
translation: 为船炮的尺寸和质量制订严格的规范。

original: Superior Hull Designs
translation: 优化船体设计

original: Standardize the hull designs for our warships so that they are better able to withstand both enemy fire and regular wear and tear.
translation: 标准化军舰的船体设计，使它们能更好地抵御敌人的炮火并减少日常使用中的磨损。

original: Timber Importation Standards
translation: 木材进口标准

original: Create strict quality standards for the timber imports we use in shipbuilding.
translation: 为造船用木材进口制定严格的质量标准。

original: The Naval Conscription Act
translation: 海军征召法案

original: Require young men living in coastal regions to do their service in the navy instead of the army.
translation: 要求住在沿海地区的年轻人在海军服役而不是陆军服役

original: The Naval Supremacy Act
translation: 海权法案

original: A strict training regime for our sailors will ensure that our ship crews understand how to most efficiently conduct a blockade and seizure of foreign relief to the siege.
translation: 一项严格的训练制度将确保我们的船员了解如何最有效地进行封锁或禁运。

original: The Maritime Intelligencer Unit
translation: 海事情报部门

original: By training loyal agents within our navy ready to put down their lives to convey information to our military we can take advantage of opportunities we might otherwise had missed.
translation: 通过在海军中训练出随时准备用生命换取情报的特工，我们的军队将不会错过任何一个可趁之机。

original: The Nautical Education Act
translation: 海事教育法

original: Ensure a high standard of education for our naval officers so that they will understand the vital principles of gunnery in battles.
translation: 让我们的海军军官接受高标准的教育，从而让他们了解战斗中炮击的原理。

original: Zealous Captains
translation: 狂热的船长

original: Select our captains to be men of faith and fire who have no qualms about boarding enemy ships to get to grips with the heathen.
translation: 遴选那些能毫不迟疑地登上敌舰与异教徒作战的充满虔诚与激情的人作为我们的舰长。

original: Autonomous Estates
translation: 庄园自主经营

original: Granting a certain degree of political autonomy to the estates of our subjects will give us more negotiating room in extracting taxes from their lands.
translation: 给予我们臣民名下的庄园一定程度的政治自主权，将使我们在从他们的土地上获得税收这一问题上有更多的谈判空间。

original: Inspirational Leaders
translation: 鼓舞人心的指挥官

original: Ensure that our officers are men of reason and learning who can inspire the common soldiers on the field of battle.
translation: 确保我们的指挥官是好学、理性的人并且能够鼓舞战场上的普通士兵。

original: The Naval Inspection Act
translation: 海军巡察法

original: Create an inspection board to look after the well-being of the regular sailors in our navy.
translation: 建立一个巡察委员会来保障我们海军中普通水手的身心健康。

original: The Preparation Act
translation: 战备法案

original: Scholarly learning tells us that war is inevitable, but it can also help us understand when it is likely to break out so that we may be prepared for it.
translation: 学术研究告诉我们，战争是不可避免的，但它能帮助我们了解战争何时将会爆发，以便我们为战争做好准备。

original: Local Militias
translation: 本地民兵

original: Give state support to local militias that can resist the incursion of foreign troops into our lands.
translation: 国家向地方民兵组织提供支持，以抵抗外国军队入侵我们的土地。

original: Unified Army Command
translation: 统一指挥

original: Include the armies of our subject states into our own command so that everyone is getting the same orders and there is no confusion on the battlefield.
translation: 把我们的各属国的军队纳入我们的指挥，以使战场上号令统一，进退有度。

original: Guerrilla Warfare
translation: 游击战

original: Create caches of weapons and supplies to allow the local population to resist foreign invasion.
translation: 建立武器和补给储备使当地人民有能力抵抗外国侵略者。

original: The Merchant Marine Act
translation: 商船法

original: Give state support to shipping and trading companies to ensure that we have a large trading fleet that can be converted into warships in times of conflict.
translation: 为运输和贸易公司提供国家支持以确保我们拥有一支可在冲突时改装成战舰的庞大的商业舰队。

original: The Pen Relies on the Sword Act
translation: 笔附于剑法案

original: Forgoing neither the power of actions nor the power of words, our nation enlists both great ambassadors and orators and the military force to back their arguments.
translation: 文字和利剑，二者缺一不可，我们的国家当然需要纵横捭阖的外交官，而一支强大的军队将是我们在谈判桌上提议的有力后盾。

original: Taxation with Representation
translation: 纳税人的选举权

original: Allowing our colonies to be represented in our government will provide us with a greater pool of loyal citizens to the state.
translation: 允许殖民地代表出席议会将让我们收获更多忠良国民。

original: The Combination Act
translation: 企业联合体法案

original: Every measure has been taken to prevent future strikes. All unlawful formations of trade- or labor unions are henceforth prohibited.
translation: 我们已采取了一切措施来预防今后的罢工，今后禁止所有非法的商人和工人公会。

original: The Court of Wards and Liveries
translation: 王室监护法院

original: With a court of wards and liveries the administration of tax collection and feudal dues is so much more effective.
translation: 建立一个王室监护法院来负责税收的管理和分封所得，使其变得更有效率。

original: Formalized Scales, Weights and Measures
translation: 统一度量衡

original: Our nation has formalized its system of weights, scales and measures. Four to eight bovates to the hide, and five hides to the fee makes a wapentake at a hundred. We're not quite sure. While this is no metric system, it does go a long way to help that we are at least decided on using the same basic units everywhere in the country.
translation: 我们的国家已经统一了度量衡. 四到八牛地等于一海德，五海德 相当于一个百户的小乡邑的土地. 我们不是很确定. 因为这不是公制单位体系，在我们最终决定在全国使用同一种基本单位前还有许多路要走。

original: Agricultural Cultivation
translation: 农业改革

original: Crop output has been maximized by shifting focus from small-scale farms to the establishment of large plantations.
translation: 农产品产量已通过将重心从小规模农场转移到建立大型种植园达到了最大化。

original: Colonial Expansion
translation: 殖民扩张

original: A resettlement program has been introduced to increase the size of our colonies.
translation: 通过实行一个定居计划来推进殖民扩张。

original: The Navigation Act
translation: 航海条令

original: Restrictions have been imposed on the use of foreign shipping in regards to trade.
translation: 用外国船运的贸易被严格限制了。

original: Importation Act
translation: 进口法案

original: Restrictions have been placed on the amount of goods that can be sold or imported from foreign countries.
translation: 来自外国的货物的进口和销售都被限制了。

original: House of Trade
translation: 贸易议院

original: A government agency has been established that will control colonial trade and colonization.
translation: 建立一个政府机关来控制殖民地贸易和殖民活动。

original: The Mining Act
translation: 采矿法案

original: Apart from a mining tax all aspects of mining are handled by private enterprises.
translation: 除了收采矿税政府不再管理私人采矿企业的其他活动。

original: Privateers
translation: 私掠者

original: Privateers have been enlisted to disrupt foreign trade and attack enemy vessels.
translation: 私掠者被征召来扰乱外国贸易和攻击地方船队。

original: Hold the Weather Gauge
translation: 占据上风

original: By assuming the advantageous position of being upwind to an enemy vessel we get a much higher degree of manouverability in combat.
translation: 通过夺取敌方舰队的上风位置，我们能在战斗中获得更强的机动性。

original: Colonial Restrictions
translation: 殖民地限制

original: Strict rules have been established in regards to trade and production to increase control over our colonies.
translation: 通过对贸易和生产的严格监控来加强对殖民地的控制。

original: The Anti-Piracy Act
translation: 反海盗法案

original: The penalties for committing piracy have been increased severely.
translation: 实行海盗行为的处罚被严厉地加强了. 越来越多的海盗寻求政府委任状的保护。

original: Recruiting Act
translation: 陆军征召法案

original: Enforcing any able-bodied man without any means of income to enlist for service will undoubtedly cause some controversy.
translation: 陆军征召法案可以让没有收入的身体健全的人加入军队，这样可以大大增加军队数量.

original: The Liquor Act
translation: 贩酒法案

original: Regulations and license fees have been introduced in regards to the sale of gin.
translation: 条例和许可费用被引入有关杜松子酒的销售中。

original: The Joint-Stock Companies Act
translation: 联合控股公司法案

original: It is henceforth forbidden to form a joint-stock company without Royal authorization.
translation: 今后禁止组成未经王室授权的股份公司。

original: The Merchant Shipping Act
translation: 商船法案

original: A limit has been imposed on a shipowner's liability in regards to damaged or lost goods due to robbery.
translation: 船主因遭劫掠而损失货物时，只负有限责任。

original: The Witchcraft Act
translation: 巫术法案

original: Any practice of witchcraft, sorcery or enchantment is henceforth considered a felony in common law.
translation: 根据巫术法，使用任何形式的妖术、巫术和魔法都是重罪。

original: The Education Act
translation: 教育法案

original: Henceforth education is compulsory for those who are to govern our legal system.
translation: 司法系统的执行者在今后有义务接受教育。

original: The Abolition of Slavery Act
translation: 废奴法案

original: Slave trade and slavery is henceforth prohibited throughout our nation.
translation: 奴隶贸易和奴隶制今后在我国境内被禁止。

original: The Judiciary Act
translation: 司法法案

original: A national court system has been established that will be responsible for the administration and interpretation of the law.
translation: 建立国家法庭系统以促进法律的管理和解释。

original: The Statute of Monopolies
translation: 垄断法令

original: By promoting free trade and free flow of goods between trading nations we have increased both our production and trade efficiency.
translation: 通过推行自由贸易和贸易国之间的自由货物流通来增加我们的生产和贸易效率。

original: The Recruitment Act
translation: 海军征召法案

original: Enforcing any able-bodied man without any means of income to enlist for naval service will undoubtedly cause some controversy.
translation: 迫使体格健全的的人们进入为海军服务的名单，增加合适的海员的数量。

original: The Militia Act
translation: 民兵法案

original: The sole right of the militia, in all regards whether it be ordering or disposing lies in the hands of the king.
translation: 民兵的唯一使命，就是服从国王的一切命令。

original: The Tenures Abolition Act
translation: 废权法案

original: A fixed amount of compensation has been set for the monarch and various types of military and agricultural tenures owed to the crown have been removed.
translation: 给予君主一定的补偿，同时减少王室的军事、农业所有权。

original: The Dissolution Act
translation: 分权法案

original: Every measure has been taken to prevent the king from exercising absolute control over his kingdom without the consent of the Parliament.
translation: 采取一切措施来防止国王绕过议会来控制他的王国。

original: The Statute in Restraint of Appeals
translation: 申述限制法令

original: We have officially demoted the Pope and instead raise the king to be the final, legal authority in all matters of religion.
translation: 我们正式地削减了教宗在我们的各种宗教事务中的权利，取而代之的是由我们的国王来处理这些事。

original: The Licensing of the Press Act
translation: 出版执照法案

original: We have adopted strict rules and regulations in regards to printing to minimize the amount of treasonous and abusing texts in our society.
translation: 我们对印刷物实行了严格的规章制度，来减少我们社会中的叛国的和不文明的文章。

original: The Fleet is our Wooden Wall
translation: 舰队是我们的海上长城

original: I never said the French aren't coming, I just said they would not come by sea.
translation: 我从未说过法兰西人不会到来，我只是说他们不会从海上来。

original: Benign Neglect
translation: 善意的忽视

original: Some political freedom has been granted to our colonies in order to improve relations.
translation: 为了增进跟殖民地的关系，一些殖民地的政治上的自由被保证了。

original: Provincial Taxation System
translation: 省份税收系统

original: We have established a permanent provincial taxation system that will optimize gains for the treasury.
translation: 我们已经建立了一个永久的省份税收体系，这将为国库增加收入。

original: Foreign Conscription Centers
translation: 境外征召中心

original: We can access our subjects population and resources a lot cheaper if we setup dedicated conscription centers in their larger cities.
translation: 如果在附庸国的大城市建立征召中心，他们的人力资源就能更轻易地为我所用。
